text: Ok newbee question: Is there an equivalent to 'intellisense' for Python?

childList.text: Is there an equivalent to 'intellisense' for Python?

text: Perhaps i shouldn't admit it but I find having intellisense really speeds up the 'discovery phase' of learning a new language.
For instance switching from VB.net to C# was a breeze due to snippets and intellisense helping me along.
